r.s: Provides a way to work with self contained multibyte strings
r.d: Provides a method of storing and manipulating multibyte strings in PHP without using ext/mbstring. Also allows conversion between various methods of storing Unicode in 8 byte strings like UTF-8 and HTML entities.
r.n: QA release PHP5 Introduce exceptions Bug #10572 stringReplace does infinite loop Bug #11511 self:: keyword not PHP4 compatible
